sentences.sContent: The best part of the trip was the fantastic scenery.
sentences.sCn: 此次旅行最精彩之处就是那美妙绝伦的风景。

sentences.sContent: Instead of stagehands, the actors will move the scenery right in front of the audience.
sentences.sCn: 演员们将替代舞台工作人员，当着观众的面置换布景。

sentences.sContent: ...but to enjoy the beautiful scenery of Mount Huang...

remMethod.val: scene(景色) ＋ ry(场所) → 风景， 景色

words.tran: 风景优美的；舞台的；戏剧的

trans.tranOther: the natural features of a particular part of a country that you can see, such as mountains, forests, deserts etc
